b: ^ A small surge of energy and... But... I'm no longer on the ship! This is impossible!
^ Ah! Doctor Seltis! I see you haven't found a way back home yet!

Encounter1: ^Teleported into my dungeon? Now that's rare magic!
^A dragon! But where has this cursed artifact sent me!
^I believe introductions are in order. Welcome to the Dungeon, sorceress. I am both its master and guardian.
^How am I supposed to go back... I don't have time to linger here, Dragon, send me back from where I came!
^Such impatience! I have no means to send you back home, sorceress, however...
Regen: ^I invite you to explore the Dungeon : its artifacts and magical scrolls might help you find your way back home...
^Really? You have such objects here... As a scientist, it's my duty to shed light on this knowledge.
Damages: ^You're here in my domain and I set the rules. If you wish to return home, try at least to survive here...
^WHAT! My glasses! Dragon! Give me back my glasses!
Encounter2: ^That's still my goal, but the artifact is reacting strangely in this place. It's my duty to try to unravel this mystery.
^And what's the next step in your studies? Do you think you'll manage to understand this object?
^Rejoice, Dragon, you'll be able to participate in scientific progress. I've realized that to activate a new aspect of its powers I'll need your gold!
^I beg your pardon?! You'll never have my gold!
Regen2: ^But... proceed to the end of this floor, you might find my treasure there. If you survive...
Damages2: ^Ha! Try to survive this floor first, you're not worthy of laying your hands on a single coin of mine.
